title: Strategies for Building Educational Communities Using Social Networking Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to build an educational community through digital expertise modeling in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment. Participants possess intermediate expertise in elementary education, and learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and operate educational communities using mobile-based social networking platforms
Learners can build professional identities in online spaces through digital expertise modeling
Learners can analyze interactions among community participants in simulated environments and propose improvement strategies

resources: Mobile-Optimized Social Networking Platform (e.g., KakaoTalk Open Chat, Telegram Group)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
